verses.name: Mark 9:5
verses.text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.

verses.name: Mark 9:6
verses.text: For he wist not what to say; for they were sore afraid.

verses.name: Mark 9:7
verses.text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them: and a voice came out of the cloud, saying, This is my beloved Son: hear him.

verses.name: Mark 9:8
verses.text: And suddenly, when they had looked round about, they saw no man any more, save Jesus only with themselves.
